label: 普現色身
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Universal manifestation of material bodies refers to the ability of buddhas to manifest themselves in various physical forms in order to instruct sentient beings in the dharma (p. 623). [HW]"
